name: David Slade Mysteries: Case Files
description:
David Slade Mysteries: Case Files is an episodic VR adventure series set in the gritty dark streets of River Side, where David must solve gruesome and mysterious cases. These cases are told over the course of his career as a homicide detective for the RSPD. David must investigate, gather / document evidence, solve & survive. Are you up to the task?

FEATURES:

  • Dark & Mysterious crimes for you to solve.
  • Full spoken dialogue.
  • Full cinematic sound track by renowned composer Michael Gordon Shapiro.
  • Rich & Detailed Environments.
  • Use your forensic tools to examine & collect crucial evidence.
  • Cinematic cut scenes.
  • Oculus Quest (Rift Version TBA)

EARLY ACCESS INFORMATION:

As an solo indie developer, your early access purchase allows me to focus on chapter two which you will get for free in a future update. The second chapter is much longer & grander in scale in both story and game play, taking place directly after the events from chapter one. Also for those of you who bought or pre-ordered the Oculus Quest 2 an enhanced version will be coming out, which you will also get for free once released after the Quest version. However this is a special offer for early adopters that purchase this version! Thanks for your support and I can not wait to get it in your hands soon!
